channel.title: Drop rate qeustion 317 [pi]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]hello,
i have add this drops to bandos boss
#general graardor 6260:70 1971:1 1514:1 1319:1 1275:1 3024:1 1606:1 454:11 560:100 563:1 561:75 1373:1 1127:1 5300:1 2440:1 1604:1 1452:1 995:1000000 1149:1 830:1 1079:1 886:100 1608:3 11712:1 11728:1 11714:1 11724:1 11704:1 11710:1 989:1 829: 1391:1 385:1 564:1 1249:1 3052:1 892:75 1303:1 808:100 1602:1 1917:1
but it will only drop random items i have killed it 1 houre and no drop of bandos or other boss items.(i have maded 1 boss drop all godwars items) any ideas what to do about it?
greetz Danny [/size]
[size=8pt]near-dragscape release soon[/size]

item.title: Drop rate qeustion 317 [pi]
item.dc:creator: @skillnocb skillnocb
item.description:
@skillnocb wrote:

Oh dude i had this problem too but i solved it :D.

Look first off you see the 6260:70 The 6260 is the npc id and the 70 is the drop chance, so now its 70%.
Okay now if you want a thing to drop 100% like the 1275:1 copy and place it 10 times like this : 1275:1 1275:1 1275:1 1275:1 1275:1 1275:1 1275:1 1275:1 1275:1 1275:1 Okay now it will drop 100%. If you want it to drop 50% just remove 5 of the 1275:1 and its 50%. ( NOTE ) If you want to make the drop chances good make it 6260:50.

Tell me if i helped you

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

called probability. Turn the percentage up.
